title: Grand.Theft.Auto.V.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Grand.Theft.Auto.V.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Release info:  

Year : 2015
Genre : Action (Shooter) / Racing (Cars) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Rockstar North
Publisher : Rockstar Games
Publication Type : RePack
Language : Eng | Rus | Multi11
Sound language : Eng
Crack : 3DM (v4)

System requirements:  

Operating system : Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 8.1 (only x64)
Processor : Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHZ (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHZ (8 CPUs)
Memory : 8GB
Video Card : NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB / AMD HD7870 2GB
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 60.5 GB


Game Information:  

Los Santos - city of the sun, starlets and stars emerged into circulation.
Once the envy of the entire Western world, it is now a haven of cheesy reality shows,
choking in the grip of economic problems. In the center of the whole mess - completely
different trio of criminals, trying desperately to catch the tail of luck in the ongoing
struggle for a place under the sun. A former member of a street gang Franklin tries to
engage with the past. A retired bank robber Michael discovers that an honest life is
not so rosy as it seemed. Rotate violence crazy Trevor interrupted from one businessman
to another in the hope of winning a big jackpot. Having exhausted the options, the three
put their lives on the line and commit a series of daring robberies in which - or pan,
or missing.

In Grand Theft Auto V fans waiting for not only the most extensive and detailed world ever
created by Rockstar Games, but also the opportunity to influence the lives and actions of
three main characters. Such intertwining stories of several characters will make the game
the most fun and exciting.

All attributes of the famous series of fully characterized and Grand Theft Auto V - here and
incredible attention to detail and signature black humor and mockery of popular culture, and
even a brand new, incredibly ambitious multiplayer mode.


Repack Features:  


Grand Theft Auto V
Game Version - v1.0.335.2 (Update 3)
Do not cut / recoded

Distribution updated on 27.04.2015.
Game Version - v1.0.335.2 (Update 3).
